mapper.insert: insert into bmw_user (account, account_type, password, nick_name, image_url, sex, create_time, last_updated) values (#{account}, #{account_type}, #{password}, #{nick_name}, #{image_url}, #{sex}, #{create_time}, #{last_updated})
mapper.select: select id from bmw_user where account = #{account} limit 1
select * from bmw_user where account = #{account} and password = #{password} limit 1
